title: 你们注册多久了？
author: hot_bread
txt_content: 额额，还差6积分升级......醉了醉了...我的号注册都2年了.......又不爱水经验..又要等每日♂任务....烦.............       你们都注册多久了- -

replies.author: isaivin
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 isaivin 于 2015-9-28 10:24 编辑 

四个月。。。反正等级也没什么用，想活跃的时候才活跃一下就好。

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 再过几个月我就可以领骨灰勋章了

replies.author: 1351680343zxw
replies.txt_content: 有几个月了吧。。。。。。
4个月左右吧?

replies.author: 醉似相思
replies.txt_content: 刚注册几小时。。。{:10_512:}有关爱新人的礼物吗楼主

replies.author: Umikaze
replies.txt_content: 你确定两年了？

replies.author: MC........
replies.txt_content: 一年

replies.author: zjy
replies.txt_content: 注册天数并没有什么用嘛

replies.author: 小宇lalala
replies.txt_content:
四个月
作为一名滗，我升级比较快

replies.author: gebi老王
replies.txt_content: 注册5天了吧 要不就是6天 忘了

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 你还没到2年吧 ←_← 才1年5个月左右吧

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 也就两年半而已

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
刚刚一年多点
我水得不多...

replies.author: 小胡子大叔
replies.txt_content: 平时水等级这么低？ovo

replies.author: 墨寻
replies.txt_content: 呐。。。刚注册了一阵。。。

replies.author: 迷途的路人
replies.txt_content: 表示这个号才注册二十几天。。

replies.author: 安梦梦
replies.txt_content: 加上被盗了的号已经有3年了吧

replies.author: zy367359
replies.txt_content: 差不多一个月 升到6级好难！

replies.author: KarenX
replies.txt_content: 几个月吧。

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 1月注册的

replies.author: x_chengz
replies.txt_content: 我也不知道自己注册多久了

replies.author: awt2003
replies.txt_content: 我都两年多了

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
你这是2年？？？
只比我早一个月啊喂

replies.author: 矿工zhanghua
replies.txt_content: 八个月吧，我记不清(～﹃～)~zZ……

replies.author: 境界の彼方
replies.txt_content: 还记得那是2002年的第一场雪。。

replies.author: 境界の彼方
replies.txt_content: 注册了200年了；；。

replies.author: 4O74Y74L74J7
replies.txt_content: 自己把鼠标移到头像上。
好久好久了，都忘了
我今年注册的，才8个月左右

replies.author: 灰常可乐
replies.txt_content: 一年多吧，一年前也注册过，不过已经不记得那个账号了（连游戏账号也不记得了）

replies.author: Gong_Pu
replies.txt_content: 大号？小号？实验大号？

replies.author: SuperXingYu
replies.txt_content: 1月3日注册的

replies.author: 那首歌
replies.txt_content: 几个月·····不过最近才玩，抓紧时间升（水）6级~
